author: @WTVYNews4
title: Girl Scouts of Southern Alabama gives back to the Wiregrass
text: Girl Scouts of Southern Alabama gives back to the Wiregrass The group’s most recent effort was the Hometown Hero project cookie delivery at Fort Novosel DOTHAN, Ala. (WTVY) - Over the last 112 years, Girl Scouts have pushed boundaries for the better. The organization pushes girls to strive for greatness and empowers them to accomplish this today, tomorrow, and beyond. Girl Scouts of Southern Alabama accomplishes this in the 30 counties it serves. “The focus of Girl Scouts is helping build girls of courage, confidence, and character who make the world a better place,” Karlyn Edmonds, the CEO, said. It all begins with teaching leadership skills and teaching the importance of community service and patriotism. Edmonds said this is to prepare these girls to be productive citizens. One of the group’s most recent efforts was the Hometown Heroes Donation Program where they donated 50 cases of cookies to Fort Novosel. “We want to make sure those people feel a little bit of love from the Girl Scouts and a thank you for their service,” Edmonds said. This is an annual project to show appreciation to military service members, police departments, fire rescue, and other first responders. “We offer the opportunity both for people to maybe they don’t want to actually purchase a box of cookies themselves, or they are a company that wants to give back to their community, to donate funds for our cookies for our hometown heroes,” Edmonds said. When you think of Girl Scouts you probably think of your favorite cookie. Whether it’s Thin Mints, Samoas, or Tagalongs, just know there is so much more meaning behind this program than these cookies. Edmonds is not only the CEO of Girl Scouts of Southern Alabama, but she is a Girl Scout mom. Her daughter has been a Girl Scout for 13 years. “Not only have I seen the magic that girl scouting provides for so many girls across southern Alabama, I have seen it in my own home,” Edmonds said. It’s a strong task, but it’s all done while having a little fun. “It’s fun to make new friends and I can make more friends and have more fun,” Emma Ehrig, a Girl Scout, said. The group’s calendar stays filled with trips and activities. “From spending the night at the Montgomery Biscuits Stadium to exploring different activities at Troy University and at Auburn University,” Edmonds said. “We also do an overnight at the USS Alabama each year. We also do some programming around STEM. You name it and if that’s what the girls are interested in, that is what we provide for them.” An extra plus to keep these girls motivated and earn recognition for their dedication to the organization’s mission is earning badges. Audrey Griger has been a Girl Scout for four years. She has too many badges to count…her favorite? “The babysitting course one,” Geiger said. A course where she learned about babysitting safety. She was taught hands-on experience for a skill she can use for life. “I know the Girl Scout experience is making a difference in the lives of girls across southern Alabama and really across the world and it’s an honor to be a part of that,” Edmonds said. These girls challenge you to become, invest, or volunteer. Girl Scouts is open to girls in kindergarten through 12th grade. There are numerous ways for you to join the Girl Scouts mission. “We are always looking for new volunteers to support these girls,” Edmonds said. To get involved click [ here](https://www.girlscoutssa.org/?fbclid=IwAR0IIB-kXeDCCwOe5wgkaK3m9wGStElj7qF4VeLlfWYvqBBsNkP-3g6Qyj4). To view the Facebook page [here.](https://www.facebook.com/girlscoutssa) To contact Girl Scouts of Southern Alabama you can call: 334-272-9164 Subscribe to our [News 4 newsletter](https://www.wtvy.com/newsletter/) and receive the latest local news and weather straight to your email every morning. Get instant notifications on top stories from News 4 by downloading our [mobile apps](https://www.wtvy.com/apps). Copyright 2024 WTVY. All rights reserved.

author: @Masrawy
title: تداول صور امتحان الفيزياء على "جروبات الغش".. والتعليم تحذر | مصراوى
text:
كتب- أحمد الجندي:
تشهد بعض جروبات الغش عبر تطبيق تليجرام في الوقت الحالي تداول صور يزعم البعض أنها تتعلق بامتحان مادة الفيزياء، والذي يؤديه طلاب الثانوية العامة 2025 حاليًا داخل لجان الامتحانات الرسمية.
وفي هذا السياق، أصدرت وزارة التربية والتعليم والتعليم الفني تنويهًا عاجلًا، موجهًا للطلاب الذين يحاولون الإخلال بسير لجان الثانوية العامة 2025، مؤكدة أنها لن تتهاون مع أي تصرفات تخل بالقوانين المنظمة لسير الامتحانات أو تعكس سوء سلوك من داخل اللجان.
وأكدت الوزارة أن لجان امتحانات الثانوية العامة 2025 تخضع لإشراف صارم وإجراءات رقابية دقيقة، مشددة على أنه سيتم التعامل بحزم مع أي طالب يثبت تورطه في مخالفات تتعلق بالغش أو التلاعب أو نقل الأسئلة عبر وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي، وسيتم تطبيق القوانين دون تهاون

21 طالبًا مصريًا في برنامج التدريب الصيفي بجامعة لويفيل الأمريكية
موعد امتحانات الدور الثاني 2025 لصفوف النقل والشهادة الإعدادية

author: Scott Duwe
title: How to play the Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown demo - Dot Esports
text:
After many years of waiting, Prince of Persia has returned in an all-new series entry called The Lost Crown. And a playable demo has come with it.
Recommended Videos Said demo is freely available and offers a small slice of The Lost Crown ‘s opening section, giving you an introduction to its story and cast, as well as a taste of its 2D side-scrolling platforming, exploration, and combat. It’s well worth checking out if all the glowing reviews haven’t convinced you. Plus, with the long-dormant Sands of Time remake still in development, this is going to be the only new Prince of Persia game available for a long while.
Here are all of the details on how to play the demo for Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown.
How to play the free Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown demo Everyone loves a good side-scroller. Image via Ubisoft The Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown free demo is available to download right now , having released on Jan. 11. Since the demo is free, the sampling of the action platformer will be available for all to play on a multitude of platforms.
Prince of Persia: The Lost Crown is available on PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC . How to play the demo is simple, but it depends solely on what you want to play it on.
To find the demo, simply open the corresponding shop on the platform you wish to play it on and search for the game by typing in “Prince of Persia.” The demo should be easily found and accessible for all to download at no charge. Be aware the PlayStation store has separate demos for the PS4 and PS5, so be sure to download the right one.
It should be the first thing that pops up if you search for Prince of Persia. Screenshot by Dot Esports If you wish to download the PC version, you should know the demo is only available via the Epic Games Store and Ubisoft Connect . There’s no point searching for the demo on Steam since the game isn’t available there.
The full game launched on Jan. 18, but players who purchased the Deluxe Edition or are subscribed to Ubisoft+ got early access on Jan. 15.
Author Scott Duwe Staff Writer & Call of Duty lead. Professional writer for over 10 years. Lover of Destiny 2, Metal Gear, Pokémon, Resident Evil, Final Fantasy, Marvel Snap, and more. Previous bylines include PC Gamer, Red Bull Esports, Fanbyte, and Esports Nation. DogDad to Yogi the Corgi, sports fan (NY Yankees, NY Jets, NY Rangers, NY Knicks), Paramore fanatic, cardio enthusiast. Author Michael Beckwith Staff writer at Dot Esports. Nintendo fan and Sonic the Hedgehog apologist. Knows a worrying amount of Kingdom Hearts lore. Has previously written for Metro, TechRadar, and Game Rant.

author: Umer Jamshaid
title: Boeing Workers Strike After Rejecting Contract - UrduPoint
text:
Umer Jamshaid Published September 13, 2024 | 05:00 PM
Seattle, (APP - UrduPoint / Pakistan Point News - 13th Sep, 2024) Thousands of Boeing factory workers in the United States walked off the job Friday after voting overwhelmingly to reject a contract with the embattled aviation giant, its first strike in 16 years.
Union leaders called for the strike to start just after midnight on Friday (0700 GMT), hours after hourly workers in the Seattle region in the Pacific Northwest spurned the tentative contract with a vote of 94.6 percent and to strike with 96 percent.
A strike will shutter two major plane assembly plants for the 737 MAX and 777 in the Puget Sound region and sidelines some 33,000 workers, further delaying the financially stressed company 's turnaround efforts.
"Our members spoke loud and clear tonight," said Jon Holden, president of the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers District 751, after the vote .
"We strike at midnight."
Picketers were out in front of the Renton plant -- where Boeing's flagship 737 Max aircraft is produced -- in the early hours of Friday, holding signs reading "On strike against Boeing", according to Bloomberg.
Thursday's vote was a decisive rejection of a deal that line workers said was far less generous than depicted by Boeing executives, marking the latest show of defiance by unions following earlier strikes in the auto, entertainment and other industries.

author: @juliana
title: Patrícia Abravanel retorna ao SBT após morte de Silvio Santos
text:
TV e Famosos
Entretenimiento Patrícia Abravanel se emociona em retorno ao SBT após morte de Silvio Santos A apresentadora é uma das filhas de Silvio, que faleceu no dia 17 de agosto
Por Juliana Gomes
Atualizada em 30/08/2024 - 08:21hs BRT
whatsapp
Por Juliana Gomes
Atualizada em 30/08/2024 - 08:21hs BRT
De volta ao SBT Nesta quinta-feira (29), Patrícia Abravanel fez seu retorno aos estúdios do SBT após a perda de seu pai, Silvio Santos . Antes de dar início às gravações, ela interagiu um pouco com a plateia e acabou se emocionando.
Patrícia Abravanel retorna ao SBT após morte de Silvio Santos – Fotos: Reprodução/SBT Iza e Yuri Lima não vão durar como casal, afirma Carlinhos Vidente Renascer: Eliana toma atitude desesperada par salvar Egídio da cadeia “Vocês sabem que vão me ajudar a fazer o programa hoje, né? Vocês sabem que são muito bem-vindos. Não esperem muito de mim hoje, mas estou aqui. Meu sentimento a todos vocês e a gente vai continuar essa história linda” , disse.
Vale lembrar que Patrícia assumiu o comando do Programa Silvio Santos em 2022, quando o apresentador precisou se afastar das telinhas.
No vídeo postado pelo jornalista Léo Dias, a herdeira do lendário Homem do Baú também aparece indo em direção à equipe do SBT: “Também quero falar meus sentimentos a todos que estão aqui no estúdio há tanto tempo, com tanto carinho e tanta lealdade”.
“Eu e minhas irmãs estamos firmes e fortes, mas é claro que sentimos saudades. Não quero ficar assim (chorosa)”, acrescentou, tentando conter a emoção. Além de Patrícia , Silvio Santos deixou outras cinco filhas: Cintia, Silvia, Rebeca, Daniela e Renata.
Veja também
Silvio Santos tinha ritual semanal com as filhas e a esposa; Saiba qual
Morte de Silvio Santos Silvio Santos morreu no dia 17 de agosto, aos 93 anos, em decorrência de uma broncopneumonia após infecção por Influenza (H1N1).
A morte do apresentador gerou comoção por todo o país. Um dos maiores nomes da televisão brasileira, Silvio foi o fundador do SBT, além de ter sido responsável por mais um conglomerado de empresas.
O que dizem os internautas
Juliana Gomes
Juliana Gomes é uma jornalista que há cerca de quatro anos atua com ênfase em entretenimento, arte, cinema, teatro e televisão nacional e internacional. Graduada em Comunicação Social/Jornalismo pela Faculdade UNIP de Brasília, em 2019. Atualmente no Bolavip Brasil, passou por diversas agências de comunicação, incluindo área de assessoria para empresas privadas.

author: Maia Davies
title: Sky says 2,000 jobs at risk at its customer service centres
text:
Sky says 2,000 jobs at risk at customer service sites
Sky has said 2,000 call centre jobs are at risk under plans to move more of its customer service online.
The media and telecoms company plans to close three of its 10 UK customer service centres, it said on Thursday, citing changing consumer preferences and declining call volumes.
The planned cuts - which would see its Stockport, Sheffield and Leeds Central call centres close - represent 7% of its total workforce and are subject to consultation.
A Sky spokesman said it was making a multi-million pound investment in its Livingston site, near Edinburgh, as part of a transformation "to deliver quicker, simpler and more digital customer service".
As well as closing three sites, operations at its Dunfermline and Newcastle sites would also be affected by the plans.
Sky News reports that the company, which is owned by Comcast, receives around 25 million calls a year from customers across Europe each year - though it expects this to decrease by a third in the next few years.
Sky says that many customers now want different means of contacting them - including via online chat and emails - and to be able to contact them 24 hours a day.
As well as upgrading its Livingston site, the company said it would invest in "cutting-edge digital technology to make our service seamless, reliable, and available 24/7".
The Sky spokesman said: "This is about building a future-ready Sky that continues to put our customers and their needs first."
In January 2024, Sky said it was planning to cut 1,000 jobs in the UK as it moved towards more internet-based services.

author: Renzo Napa
title: Restos de Pedro Suárez-Vértiz son velados en la iglesia Nuestra Señora de Fátima
text:
El cortejo fúnebre de Pedro Suárez-Vértiz descansa en el velatorio de la iglesia Nuestra Señora de Fátima, en Miraflores. Fans y familiares
despiden al icónico cantautor, recordando su legado musical que marcó generaciones.
En un emotivo cortejo fúnebre, la carroza que traslada los restos de
Pedro Suárez-Vértiz partió de su residencia en Miraflores. Acompañado por su viuda y dos hijos llegados de España, el féretro fue despedido por conmovedores aplausos de los fans que se congregaron en las inmediaciones.
RPP confirmó que el velatorio de la iglesia Nuestra Señora de Fátima, cercana a su hogar, recibió el cuerpo del desaparecido músico, considerado un ícono del pop-rock peruano. Mientras tanto, los fanáticos continúan expresando su afecto en el parque frente a la parroquia, aplaudiendo y despidiendo al artista que marcó generaciones con su música.
Amigos, artistas y fans despiden a Pedro Suárez-Vértiz
En el mismo parque, algunos fans se han reunido para despedir al ídolo. "Gracias, Pedro Suárez-Vértiz, hasta siempre. Que Dios te tenga en su gloria", dijo uno de los seguidores. También se pudo apreciar a artistas como Ernesto Pimentel y Raúl Romero, quienes acudieron para despedir los restos mortales del famoso intérprete de Me estoy enamorando.
"Creo que merece todos los honores. El mejor homenaje es escuchar su música, compartir su música", comentó Pimentel al salir del velorio. El servicio fúnebre llegó aproximadamente media hora después de que la familia del artista se reuniera en su vivienda. La jornada de tributos, que se llevarán a cabo de manera privada, está programada desde las 10 a.m. hasta las 4 p.m.
Cynthia Martínez, esposa del fallecido músico Pedro Suárez-Vértiz, arribó esta mañana a Lima desde España, acompañada por dos de sus hijos. El resto de la familia, ya en el país, esperaba su llegada para definir los detalles de las exequias del talentoso cantautor peruano, quien
nos dejó a los 54 años el pasado jueves.
Te recomendamos
Pedro Suárez-Vértiz falleció a los 54 años
Pedro Suárez-Vértiz falleció la mañana del jueves a los 54 años en su domicilio en Miraflores, confirmó a RPP fuentes policiales. Con éxitos como Un vino, una cerveza, No pensé que era amor y Me estoy enamorando, el músico deja un legado que ha marcado profundamente el panorama del pop-rock peruano.
Después de confirmar el trágico suceso en el programa
Ampliación de Noticias de RPP, la periodista Mávila Huertas evocó la memoria del músico fallecido, describiéndolo como una figura significativa para todos los peruanos. Huertas destacó cómo se convirtió en una estrella "en contra de todo".
El legado de Pedro Suárez-Vértiz
Mávila Huertas recordó el impacto de la llegada de la música de Pedro Suárez-Vértiz a la radio en un momento crucial para el país, caracterizado por una crisis económica a raíz del terrorismo. "La música de Pedro fue un aliciente para seguir creyendo en que había un futuro mejor, para poder seguir creyendo que la vida continuaba, que podía ofrecernos salidas y esperanzas", compartió.
El legado del cantante, músico y compositor perdurará gracias a inolvidables temas como Los globos del cielo, Cuéntame y Degeneración actual. Además, formó parte de la banda pop-rock Arena Hash, donde colaboró con su hermano
Patricio Suárez-Vértiz en el bajo, Arturo Pomar Jr. en la batería y Christian Meier en los teclados.

author: Stocktwits Inc
title: D-Wave CEO Says Jensen Huang's Comments '100% Off Base:' Stocktwits Poll Shows Retail Divided Over Outlook For Quantum Computing Industry Prospects- Asianet News English
text:
D-Wave CEO Says Jensen Huang’s Comments ‘100% Off Base:’ Stocktwits Poll Shows Retail Divided Over Outlook For Quantum Computing Industry Prospects D-Wave CEO Alan Baratz said the company’s powerful annealing quantum computing solutions are already available and are being used for solving real-world problems of businesses, researchers and governments.
Stocktwits Inc First Published Jan 10, 2025, 7:31 AM IST | Last Updated Jan 10, 2025, 7:31 AM IST Follow After Nvidia Corp. ($NVDA) CEO Jensen Huang triggered a sell-off in quantum computing stocks on Wednesday, D-Wave Quantum, Inc. ($QBTS) CEO Alan Baratz talked up the industry’s prospects in an interview with CNBC.
Releasing excerpts of the interview on Thursday, D-Wave noted that its CEO said the company’s powerful annealing quantum computing solutions are already available and are being used for solving real-world problems of businesses, researchers and governments.
Baratz noted that there are different quantum computing solutions, with some maturing faster than others. He added that among the different approaches to quantum, annealing and gate are the two primary approaches.
The executive said Huang’s comments may not be totally off base for gate model quantum computers, they are 100% off base for annealing quantum computers. “When it comes to D-Wave annealing quantum computing, he is dead wrong,” Baratz said.
In an Analyst event held late Tuesday, Huang poured cold water on the optimism regarding quantum computing by stating that it might take 15 to 30 years to develop very useful quantum computers, with 20 years being a more credible timeframe.
Baratz said, “We are not 30 years out, we're not 20 years out, we're not 15 years out. We are today. We are supporting businesses today with quantum compute to solve their hard problems.”
According to D-Wave’s CEO, the company has been able to solve problems on its quantum computer in the area of materials simulation in minutes, which otherwise would take more than millions of years to solve on massively parallel graphic processing unit (GPU) computers.
D-Wave said annealing quantum computing is emerging as the critical accelerant to commercial adoption of quantum computing. It believes that nearly every industry can benefit from annealing quantum computing technology.
Quantum annealing, which uses quantum mechanics to solve optimization problems, relies on the process of annealing that involves heating, soaking and cooling a material to improve its properties.
Baratz’ comments, which temporarily lifted retail sentiment toward D-Wave stock following the interview, haven’t been successful in producing a lasting impact.
QBTS sentiment and message volume January 9, 2025, as of 8:51 pm ET | Source: Stocktwits On Stocktwits, the sentiment meter read 35/100, suggesting a return of ‘bearish’ mood toward D-Wave after it improved to ‘bullish’ a day ago. Message volume has tapered off from ‘extremely high’ levels to ‘normal.’
An ongoing Stocktwits poll that sought opinions from retail watchers of quantum computing stocks on the platform said, views are divided. About 44% of the respondents said they would be bullish and considered Tuesday’s move as merely a ‘dip.’
A sizeable 32% said the technology is in its nascent stage and the hype about quantum computing stocks is fading. Fifteen percent said they were staying out, considering quantum computing investments as risky and 9% voted that they would trade the swings despite their views that these stocks are speculative investments.
D-Wave stock fell 36.13% to $6.10 on Tuesday but climbed 6.39% in the after-hours session.
The stock had surged up by 855% in 2024 but is down over 27% so far this year.
For updates and corrections, email newsroom[at]stocktwits[dot]com.<
